description.value:
An unobtrusive item that hides a concealed toxic barb. Targets hit from a scratch or cut by it must make -30 Toughness Test or take 2d10 Wounds ignoring armour and toughness. Poor Craftsmanship only does 1d10 Wounds, Good delays the illness by 1 hour. Best also deals 1d10+10 wounds

Requirements

Useful tool of assasination

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
